task.title: Remove the cover of your system
task.shortdesc: This is a simple task requiring a screwdriver.

taskbody.prereq: First be sure you are grounded.
taskbody.context: Perform the operation in a well ventilated room.

step.cmd: Unscrew the screws that hold the cover to your system.
Store them in a safe place.
Remove the cover and place it in a safe place as well.
